name: An Unstable World
description:
PLAY IN FULLSCREEN OR ELSE THE SCREEN WILL GLITCH OUT!

Uh oh, the world's coming to an end! Try to at least make all of your citizens happy, while having to face against the instability of the world, which causes natural disasters. 

-Controls-

  • Use Arrow keys or A-D to move around the world.
  • Use Space to interact with the zones where you can build.
  • (Instructions in-game, but) Use 1,2,3,4 to buy buildings, and Escape to exit the shop menu.

NOTES:

  • Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49: Unstable
  • All assets made by TheInkSkeleton
  • Ran out of time so I had to cut quite a lot of corners, though I think it could turn into a kind of good game, so perhaps I'll update it soon with things I missed.
  • Thanks for playing ;)
